UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cholesterol-conjugated stapled peptides inhibit Ebola and Marburg viruses in vitro and in vivo.
Literature.Author: Pessi A, Bixler SL, Soloveva V, Radoshitzky S, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:50% Cytotoxicity=>=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Ebola virus EBOV(IC50 I=18.47±4.64µM),Ebola virus EBOV(IC90 I=69.49µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>25µM),Ebola virus EBOV-GP PsV(IC50 E=4.02±1.13µM),Ebola virus EBOV-GP PsV(IC90=20.22µM),Marburg virus MARV-GP PsV(IC50 E=4.66±0.59µM),Marburg virus MARV-GP PsV(IC90=15.13µM)
